text: Even if we invade, "Oh, she wasn't there," isn't gonna cut it.
You think he'd just comply and leave her at headquarters? If it were me, I wouldn't.
If we can't strike them down in one fell swoop, that will likely give them a chance to counterattack.
That is the problem. Exactly "what" and "how far" they have planned is completely obscure.
He has a point. What do you think, Nighteye?
We have isolated these points as much as possible, and listed them here!
On that point, we've separated the groups and organizations with direct contact to the cleansers, as well as their locations!
